verses.verse: In the <S%G3796>end<s%> of the <S%G4521>sabbath,<s%> as it <S%G2020>began<s%> to <S%G2020>dawn<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> the <S%G3391>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week,<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene<s%> and the <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> to <S%G2334>see<s%> the <S%G5028>sepulcher.<s%>

And, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there was a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake:<s%> for the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2597>descended<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G617>rolled<s%> <S%G617>back<s%> the <S%G3037>stone<s%> from the <S%G2374>door,<s%> and <S%G2521>sat<s%> on it.
His <S%G2397>countenance<s%> was <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G796>lightning,<s%> and his <S%G1742>raiment<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> as <S%G5510>snow:<s%>
And for <S%G5401>fear<s%> of him the <S%G5083>keepers<s%> did <S%G4579>shake,<s%> and <S%G1096>became<s%> as <S%G3498>dead<s%> men.

And the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G1135>women,<s%> <S%G5399>Fear<s%> not you: for I <S%G1492>know<s%> that you <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G4717>crucified.<s%>

He is not <S%G5602>here:<s%> for he is <S%G1453>risen,<s%> as he <S%G2036>said.<s%> <S%G1205>Come,<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2749>lay.<s%>

And <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G5035>quickly,<s%> and <S%G2036>tell<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> that he is <S%G1453>risen<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead;<s%> and, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> he <S%G4254>goes<s%> <S%G4254>before<s%> you <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee;<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> shall you <S%G3700>see<s%> him: <S%G2400>see,<s%> I have <S%G2036>told<s%> you.

And they <S%G1831>departed<s%> <S%G5035>quickly<s%> from the <S%G3419>sepulcher<s%> with <S%G5401>fear<s%> and <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5479>joy;<s%> and did <S%G5143>run<s%> to <S%G518>bring<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G518>word.<s%>

And as they <S%G4198>went<s%> to <S%G518>tell<s%> his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G528>met<s%> them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> All hail. <S%G5463><s%> And they <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G2902>held<s%> him by the <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> him.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to them, Be not <S%G5399>afraid:<s%> <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G518>tell<s%> my <S%G80>brothers<s%> that they <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and <S%G1563>there<s%> shall they <S%G3700>see<s%> me.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when they were <S%G4198>going,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G2892>watch<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city,<s%> and <S%G518>showed<s%> to the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> the things that were <S%G1096>done.<s%>

And when they were <S%G4863>assembled<s%> with the <S%G4245>elders,<s%> and had <S%G2983>taken<s%> <S%G4824>counsel,<s%> they <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G2425>large<s%> <S%G694>money<s%> to the <S%G4757>soldiers,<s%>
<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G2036>Say<s%> you, His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> by <S%G3571>night,<s%> and <S%G2813>stole<s%> him away while we <S%G2837>slept.<s%>
And <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G191>come<s%> to the <S%G2232>governor's<s%> <S%G191>ears,<s%> we will <S%G3982>persuade<s%> him, and <S%G4160>secure<s%> <S%G275><s%> you.

<S%G1161>So<s%> they <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G694>money,<s%> and <S%G4160>did<s%> as they were <S%G1321>taught:<s%> and <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%> is <S%G1310>commonly<s%> <S%G1310>reported<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3360>until<s%> <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G4594>day.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> the <S%G1733>eleven<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> away <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3735>mountain<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G5021>appointed<s%> them.
And when they <S%G1492>saw<s%> him, they <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> him: but <S%G3588>some<s%> <S%G1365>doubted.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> to me in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and in earth. <S%G1093><s%>

<S%G4198>Go<s%> you <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> and <S%G3100>teach<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations,<s%> <S%G907>baptizing<s%> them in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and of the <S%G5207>Son,<s%> and of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> Ghost: <S%G4151><s%>

<S%G1321>Teaching<s%> them to <S%G5083>observe<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G3745>whatever<s%> I have <S%G1781>commanded<s%> you: and, <S%G2400>see,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> with you always, <S%G3956><s%> <S%G2250><s%> even to the <S%G4930>end<s%> of the world. <S%G165><s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
